title: slowdowns and other graphical issues
body:
these are issues that i've been having only since 6.22 or 6.23

the most prominent and consistent issue is that seemingly randomly while playing, my character movement will slow down, then will speed up again a couple of seconds later to catch up with where it should be. This isn't an fps issue - there is no noticable difference in fps during this time. It sounds like a thing that should happen if I'm having connection issues, but I'm on a stable internet connection and am having no issues with any other online games.

I also have other graphical issues. They don't seem related to my main problem on the surface, but they started happening at the same time. The two I've noticed so far are that I don't see the spawn animations for any jungle camps, and that whenever Ekko uses his Q, its not in the right place. Instead of being where it should be, it hovers about twice the cast range away.

Any idea whats causing this stuff?

replies.body:
What it sounds like you're experiencing is *Packet Loss* or *Extreme Packet Buffering*, which occurs if there are issues along your route to the server. Before we take an in-depth look at your route, I'd like you to confirm all your local settings are compatible with League by working through the steps outlined in our [**connection guide.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Please let me know how those steps went for you.
